site.name: Prestige Realty Group
site.description: Excellence in Real Estate Since 1985. Premier brokerage serving the Bay Area's most discerning buyers and sellers.
site.author: Prestige Realty Group

brokerage.name: Prestige Realty Group
brokerage.description: We connect discerning buyers with exceptional properties, delivering unparalleled service across the Bay Area's premier markets.

about.subtitle: About Us
about.title: A Legacy of Excellence
about.description: Founded in 1985, Prestige Realty Group has built an unmatched reputation for delivering exceptional real estate services. Our team of dedicated professionals combines deep market expertise with a client-first philosophy, ensuring every transaction exceeds expectations.

highlights.title: Client-Centered Approach
highlights.description: Every decision we make is guided by what is best for our clients.

highlights.title: Market Leadership
highlights.description: Recognized as the top brokerage in our primary markets for over a decade.

highlights.title: Innovation & Technology
highlights.description: Leveraging cutting-edge tools to provide superior service and insights.

services.subtitle: Our Services
services.title: Comprehensive Real Estate Solutions
services.description: From residential to commercial, we offer a full spectrum of real estate services tailored to your needs.

items.title: Residential Sales
items.description: Expert guidance for buying or selling luxury homes, condos, and estates in premier neighborhoods.

items.title: Commercial Real Estate
items.description: Strategic advisory for office spaces, retail properties, and industrial real estate investments.

items.title: Property Management
items.description: Full-service property management ensuring your investments are maintained and profitable.

items.title: Investment Advisory
items.description: Data-driven insights and strategies to build and optimize your real estate portfolio.

items.title: Relocation Services
items.description: Seamless transition support for corporate relocations and international moves.

items.title: Market Analysis
items.description: Comprehensive market research and valuation reports for informed decision-making.

markets.subtitle: Our Markets
markets.title: Premier Locations We Serve
markets.description: Deep expertise across the most desirable real estate markets.

items.name: San Francisco
items.description: Iconic city living with world-class amenities

agents.subtitle: Our Team
agents.title: Meet Our Expert Agents
agents.description: Industry-leading professionals dedicated to your success.

listings.subtitle: Properties

items.name: Jennifer & Mike Thompson
items.text: Prestige Realty exceeded all our expectations. Their team's professionalism and market knowledge helped us find our dream home in a competitive market.

items.name: Robert Chen
items.text: Working with Prestige to sell our property was a seamless experience. They handled everything from staging to closing with exceptional attention to detail.

items.name: Lisa Park
items.text: As a first-time luxury buyer, I was nervous about the process. The team at Prestige guided me every step of the way with patience and expertise.

items.name: Tech Ventures Inc.
items.text: Their commercial real estate team found us the perfect headquarters. Their understanding of the tech industry's unique needs was invaluable.

items.name: The Anderson Family
items.text: After relocating from New York, Prestige made our transition to the Bay Area smooth and stress-free. We couldn't be happier with our new home.

items.name: Marcus Johnson
items.text: The investment advisory team helped me build a diversified real estate portfolio. Their market analysis is second to none.

contact.subtitle: Contact Us
contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Ready to start your real estate journey? Our team is here to help.

seo.title: Prestige Realty Group - Bay Area Luxury Real Estate
seo.description: Premier real estate brokerage serving the Bay Area since 1985. Expert agents, exceptional properties, and unparalleled service for buyers and sellers.
